name: @philidem/rewrite-relative-paths
description: Tool for rewriting paths in import and require statements that start with ~
author: Phil Gates-Idem <phillip.idem@gmail.com>

scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn compile && cp -R package.json yarn.lock LICENSE README.md ./src/bin ./dist/src
scripts.autobuild: yarn build && (cd ./dist/src && yarn install --production && (yarn unlink || true) && yarn link) && yarn nodemon --exec 'yarn compile' --watch ./src -e ts
scripts.publish:patch: yarn publish:prepare && npm version patch && yarn build && npm publish --access public ./dist/src
scripts.publish:minor: yarn publish:prepare && npm version minor && yarn build && npm publish --access public ./dist/src
scripts.publish:major: yarn publish:prepare && npm version major && yarn build && npm publish --access public ./dist/src
